description.value:
When you reach a Druid level specified in the Circle of the Sea Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Circle of the Sea Spells
Druid LevelPrepared Spells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFogCloud00]{Fog Cloud}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGustOfWind]{Gust of Wind}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRayOfFrost]{Ray of Frost}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplShatter000]{Shatter}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThunderwav]{Thunderwave}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWaterBreat]{Water Breathing}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplControlWat]{Control Water}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplIceStorm00]{Ice Storm}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMaelstrom0]{Maelstrom}
